name: Gods Desire Game
author: Wenyuan Culture &#40闻源文化&#41
content: Wang Ming, who has lost all his organs, travels through a world of desires, hoping to become a normal person again. After experiencing life and death and completing the final challenge, Wang Ming can finally fulfill his inner desire. &#039I hope this world becomes prosperous, democratic, civilized, and harmonious...&#039 God of Desire: &#039Huh?&#039&quot
